text.page:
470
094-235b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a gra bid+yA man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/ longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM

471
094-236a shad+khi ni de bi ta A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne d+ha na dza ye/ brI brI br-I d+d+hi ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+r-i ti ka rI nA na/ bi bi d+yA be sha bsta/ A yur+d+ha ra Ni yu yu/ A yuSh+bA la ni ta thA ga tA sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma tI laM bo da ra/ de hi me bar na shad+bi ni swA hA/ bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyis don byed par gyur cig /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
